entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 24.
